name: Substantial
tagline: Innovation + Build Studio in Seatte, WA
description:
Founded in 2006 in Seattle, Substantial (www.substantial.com) is an industry-leading studio recognized for creating high-quality custom software in partnership with some of the world’s biggest brands. They are strategic creatives and technologists capable of imagining and building business-changing digital products and empowering responsible, sustainable product cultures for clients, their customers, and the world around them.
Headquartered in Seattle, Substantial also has distributed fulltime team members in the Bay Area and UK.
